title: France panorama. [No. 70?/??]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. After the cease fire - international meeting. 2. Saint Marie de la Mere - gypsy pilgrimage to pay homage to two Saints, at this seaside town. 3. Mark Chagall - biography, including painting of Paris opera ceiling. 4. School of the sea - one-month long school to learn “the craft of the seaman”. For boys. 5. Saving the Masais - Detailing restoration of the historic Parisian quarter. 6. The French Patrol - Air force squadron. One of world’s best aerial acrobatic teams.
